Package gui

Class InformationPanel

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
javafx.scene.control.ListView
gui.InformationPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Updateable, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class InformationPanel
extends javafx.scene.control.ListView
implements java.io.Closeable, Updateable
This is the log area Implements the Logger interface in order to be compatibe with the Engine Modules

      public void viewUpdate()
      This is a little trick to force javafx to re-draw this entity We just resize it a bit in order to trigger the internal private draw methods :)
